alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 3:21PM MDT until April 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Porthill, Elk, Quincy, Winchester, Worley, Cheney, Hayden, Rathdrum, Ephrata, Naples, Creston, Coolin, Eastport, Ralston, Colville, Arden, Newman Lake, Bonners Ferry, Clayton, Othello, Lamona, Odessa, Moses Lake, Kettle Falls, Rockford, Coulee City, Spokane, Sandpoint, Coeur d`Alene, Electric City, Wilbur, Post Falls, Newport, Harrington, Davenport, Priest River, Grand Coulee, Chewelah, Stratford, Orin, Deer Park, Ritzville, and Coulee Dam. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
